job.title: MSP Network Engineer
job.description: DescriptionbrpWe are hiring within our MSP Managed Services Provider Infrastructure team As a MSP Network Engineer you will be responsible for following established network designs configuring and deploying networking technologies addressing network support issues and performing network maintenance tasks for both Intermax Networks and our MSP clientele brbrppbrbrbrppstrongRoles and responsibilitiesstrong brbrpulliInstall configure and maintain IT infrastructure for MSP clients including firewalls switches and wireless access points  liliNetwork and Firewall administration supporting implementation of security policies and remediating conflicts liliCoordination with system and application owners schedule and apply rule changes test and validate liliEnsure system availability and reliability liliProvide Level23 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues liliWorking with thirdparty providers to keep the networks running efficiently liulbrbrRequirementsbrulli2 years of experience in Routing and Network Engineering liliKnowledge of infrastructure equipment and design to include firewalls switches Wireless Access Points and other networking technologies liliAbility to work well both individually and in a team liliProven handson experience liliExcellent communication skills liliWatchGuard andor Ubiquiti product line experience a plus liliNetworking certifications such as WatchGuard Cisco Ubiquiti or CompTIA Network a plusliul
